--------------------
Text: The American Film Institute Award for Independent Film and Video Artists, subtitled and generally known as the Maya Deren Award, was an award presented to filmmakers and video artists by the American Film Institute to honor independent filmmaking.

Triplets:
<American Film Institute Award
1:
--------------------
Text: Maya Deren Award:  Named for the avant-garde experimental film artist Maya Deren, it was given from 1986 through 1996.
Triplets:<Maya Deren Award
